commandDescription.by_branch: Run a scan of a branch
commandDescription.by_pull_request: Run a scan of a pull_request
commandDescription.by_branch_revision: Run a scan of a git revision on a given branch

flagDescriptionClientId: Clayton client id for OAuth 2.0 authentication
flagDescriptionClientSecret: Clayton client secret for OAuth 2.0 authentication
flagDescriptionProjectId: unique identifier of the environment or repository
flagDescriptionPullRequestNumber: number identifier of the pull request
flagDescriptionRefreshToken: Clayton refresh token for OAuth 2.0 authentication
flagDescriptionWait: timeout in minutes for waiting the scan to be processed ( minimium 5 )
flagErrorMissing_client-id: --client-id flag for Clayton client id for OAuth 2.0 authentication is required
flagErrorMissing_client-secret: --client-secret flag for Clayton client secret for OAuth 2.0 authentication is required
flagErrorMissing_refresh-token: --refresh-token flag for Clayton refresh token for OAuth 2.0 authentication is required
flagErrorMissing_project: --project flag for environment or repository identifier is required
flagErrorMissing_scan: --scan flag for scan identifier is required
flagErrorMissing_workspace: --workspace flag for workspace identifier is required
